name: ProjectNOMNOM Demo
description:
Remake of a game jam submission in early development stage. This is demo of the first world but still a lot of polish needs to be applied. It's a puzzle game which requires you to put animals in the right places by switching between them.

This demo has an early version of the first world, 27 levels to play and 3 total stars to collect. Game saves automatically when completing a level and when pressing title screen/quit.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move around
  • WASD keys to switch between animals/levels in orthogonal directions 
  • ESC key to pause
  • Q key to start a level

Credits:

  • Sound effects by newagesoup (https://freesound.org/people/newagesoup/) and djlprojects (https://freesound.org/people/djlprojects/).
  • Graphics, music, coding and design by me.
  • Made with Godot game engine.
